name: Unreal Heroes
description: Unreal Heroes is a game in 2D inspired by strike force heroes and built on unreal engine 4.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core-2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 480, Radeon 4870 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 4670k Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
